name: Grand Pine Forest
description:
"Grand Pine Forest" is a small first person adventure game which includes interactive puzzles and voice narrated story.

You as the main character wakes up in the forest with no memory how you got here. You explore the forest, hearing a voice you never hear before but claims to have know you.

What to expect:

  • First Person and Low poly style
  • A very simple 5-10 minute adventure game
  • Simple puzzles

What To Not Expect

  • Immersive Story Driven game with choices
  • Mind boggling puzzles

I understand that I've not done a good job in leading the player towards objectives and also some puzzles are not well thought out. Here is a guide to proceed if you get stuck

Guide

  1. Pick up trash to unlock the first phone
  2. Go to the sunflower field
    1. There is an Egg hanging on a tree on the right side of the sunflowers (orange tree)
    2. One egg on a sunflower itself near the rock
    3. One egg underneath the bridge on the right side
    4. One egg underneath a tree on the left side of the sunflowers (green tree)
  3. Cross the bridge, go up hill to home
  4. Tidy up home, 
    1. Bucket
    2. 2 stone steps in front of the house
    3. The flower pot
    4. Ladder behind the house
    5. The scarecrow at the farm
  5. Go back cross the bridge, the ruins is on the right side. Pass the car and go deeper into the tree trunk.
  6. The ruins puzzle has buttons on the pillars hiding. Hard to explain but there is 1 on the left side and 2 on the right side.
  7. This will then lead to go back crossing the bridge but instead of going up hill, go to the right side and pass the pier to the giant stone wall.
  8. After the phone call at the lake. You need to cross the bridge again.
  9. Go between the giant pine forest and the mountain on the right side.
  10. Find the last phone call, and at the end of it. Click on the grave stone.
